title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union frock coat and infantry Hardee hat with sword, revolver, and fife] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in Union frock coat and infantry Hardee hat with sword, revolver, and fife] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.1 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
